thread.title: Head to Sao Paulo to enjoy the Brazilian Grand Prix
thread.title_full: Head to Sao Paulo to enjoy the Brazilian Grand Prix - timesofindia-economictimes

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Head to Sao Paulo to enjoy the Brazilian Grand Prix
text:
FORMULA ONE 
Region: Brazil
Dates: November 13- 15, 2015
The Brazilian Grand Prix certainly is a special occasion on the motorsport calendar not least because of the Senna era and the fanatic fans turning Sao Paulo at Interlagos into a festival and carnival atmosphere for the F1 weekend.
The nightlife of Sao Paulo is full of concerts, gigs and more. Stay a week more to enjoy the happening city of Sao Paulo. 
QUICK GETAWAYS (From Sao Paulo): 
Brotas: It is a city famous for its adventure leisure activities, rafting being the most famous one. It fs 257 kms away from Sao Paulo. Barretos: Up at the northeast tip of the state is where Brazil fs largest rodeo party takes place, bringing together the best in Brazilian and world country music to a week festival.
Indaiatuba: Millionaires addicted to the Polo lifestyle have always loved this town. Today, the region that began as a small swiss colony holds one of the highest density of private Polo fields in the world.
